name: Paris
description: Discover the city of love — Eiffel Tower, art, and fine cuisine.

name: Bali
description: Relax on sandy beaches, explore temples, and enjoy tropical beauty.

name: Cape Town
description: Adventure meets beauty — hike Table Mountain and visit the Cape Peninsula.

title: Zambezi National Part
description: A beautiful wildlife area, home to elephants, lions, giraffes, and many birds. Visitors can enjoy game drives, boat cruises, and stunning views of the Zambezi River.

name: New York City
description: Experience the city that never sleeps — Times Square, Broadway, and Central Park.

name: Tokyo
description: A perfect blend of technology and tradition — from Shibuya to ancient temples.

name: Victoria Falls
description: It is one of the largest waterfalls in the world, found between Zimbabwe and Zambia. It is called “The Smoke That Thunders” because of its powerful sound and rising mist.

name: Chinhoyi Caves
description: Chinhoyi Caves are a stunning group of limestone caves in Zimbabwe, famous for their deep blue pool called the Sleeping Pool. The clear water and natural cave formations make it a unique and beautiful place to visit.

title: Devil pool
description: It is a natural rock pool right on the edge of Victoria Falls, where visitors can swim safely during the dry season. It gives a thrilling view over the waterfall, making it one of the most exciting experiences in Africa.

name: Dubai Safari
description: Experience several desert pursuits in one outing

name: Legoland
description: The most fun place to visit with kids

name: Giza Pyramids
description: Experience the home of the ancient Pharaohs,a destination full of dazzling temples and tombs that will wow you..

name: Phuket Island
description: Experience the most stunning beauty, magical history, and rich, cultural traditions..

name: Grand Canyon National Park
description: Experience the outdoor activities such as hiking, overnight backpacking, cycling, photography and scenic drives.
